backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for content, ads, analytics, brands, channels, and media within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for two live playback fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing UI behavior, routing, and admin features.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all application routes using TanStack Router and wraps the app with AuthProvider and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsD: Admin dashboard showing key analytics stats, trending content, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandManag: UI for creating, deleting, and updating brands, including logo upload and assigning films, series, clips, and live channels.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChannelMan: Manages live channels with create, edit, update, and delete actions, including logo handling and original-content flag.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClipsManag: Handles uploading, editing, and deleting clip-type video content with video/thumbnail blobs and metadata settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/LiveSchedu: Allows assigning and removing scheduled video programs on live channels, updating each channelâ€™s schedule.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManualAdsM: Supports uploading ad media files and creating or deleting ad assignments with configurable targeting and playback options.
frontend/src/components/admin/MoviesMana: Admin UI for uploading, editing, and deleting movie/film videos with metadata, thumbnails, trailers, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/PodcastsMa: Admin UI for managing podcast uploads and edits, handling video and thumbnail files with premium/original flags.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeriesMana: Admin interface for creating and editing TV series, seasons, and episodes including media uploads and metadata.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripeSetu: Form for configuring and updating Stripe payment credentials with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoManag: General video management tool for uploading, editing, and deleting non-clip videos with metadata and media files.
Reusable modal component that displays contextual info with configurable types, icons, and actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding and clickable links that open contextual modals for privacy, terms, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, search, auth controls, mobile menu, and user/admin profile logic.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero banner with autoplaying preview or video player, branding, title, description, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header, footer, outlet content area, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/live/LiveGuideGr: Renders a scrollable EPG-style grid showing channels, time slots, and current-time positioning. Handles automatic scrolling, channel selection, and display layout with badges and icons.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting Internet Identity users to submit their email and save profile data.
frontend/src/components/SeriesCard.tsx: Clickable series card showing thumbnail, description, seasons, episodes, and original badge.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Clickable video card displaying thumbnail, metadata, content type, and premium/original indicators.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Advanced custom video player with autoplay, ads, preview mode, quality options, controls, and live seek logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes. Provides the current actor and fetching state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Implements global authentication state for email-password and Internet Identity, including session restoration and login/logout flows. Exposes auth status, errors, and helper actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity restoration using Dfinity AuthClient. Manages identity state, login status, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data like profiles, videos, channels, and admin status. Integrates with the actor and auth state for conditional querying.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: A hook that syncs React state with sessionStorage for persistence across page reloads. Supports safe JSON parsing and writing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a deep red/black theme with gradients, custom colors, animations, and scrollbar styling. Sets global background and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with permission checks, loading state, and tabbed management sections for videos, clips, series, channels, live, brands, ads, and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a brand's details along with its associated films, series, and clips, handling loading and missing-brand states.
frontend/src/pages/ClipsPage.tsx: Loads and displays all clips in a responsive grid with skeleton loading and navigation to individual clip playback.
frontend/src/pages/EpisodePlayerPage.tsx: Finds and plays a specific episode with ad logic, authentication checks, and fallbacks for missing episode data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds a dynamic homepage featuring videos, series, brands, and ads with an auto-rotating featured slideshow and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Displays live TV channels with program tracking, schedule-based playback, ad logic, and a watch/guide mode toggle.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login and registration page handling email auth, II admin login, validation, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/MoviesPage.tsx: Fetches all videos, filters non-clips as movies, and displays them with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/NetworksPage.tsx: Loads brand data and displays network cards with navigation to individual brand pages.
frontend/src/pages/OriginalsPage.tsx: Shows original films, series, documentaries, and educational videos with tab filtering.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe session, updates premium status, and shows a success screen with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows authenticated user profile, premium/admin badges, and reconstructed watch history.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Fetches search results, filters them by type, and displays loading states, empty states, and categorized results.
frontend/src/pages/SeriesDetailPage.tsx: Loads a series by ID, shows a hero section with metadata, and lists seasons and episodes with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/TVShowsPage.tsx: Retrieves and displays all TV series with loading placeholders and a fallback when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/UpgradePage.tsx: Handles premium upgrade flow using Stripe, redirects admins, and renders a feature list with checkout processing.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Loads video data, determines premium access, resolves ads, and renders the video player with access control and fallbacks.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Provides an empty module placeholder for shared types.
frontend/src/utils/contentType.ts: Utility helpers for mapping and checking content types, including movie/film and podcast categorization.
frontend/src/utils/epg.ts: Generates time slots and computes program blocks for an EPG, including looping schedules and current program detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom color variables, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture notes, known issues, and planned features for a video streaming platform with admin and live TV components.
